featured.text: To discuss how a modern epidemic may spread quickly.
All the time that we spend rooted in the chair is linked to increased risks of so many deadly diseases that experts have named this modern-day health epidemic the “sitting disease.”

definition.zh_def: 流行病：在特定地區或人群中迅速傳播的疾病。
definition.en_def: An epidemic is a sudden outbreak of a disease that spreads rapidly within a specific area or population.
definition.example: The city implemented strict measures to control the spread of the epidemic.
